snippet: The N.H.L. and the players union will return to the bargaining table on Tuesday in New York, hoping momentum generated over the weekend can lead to a labor deal.
abstract: NHL and players' union leaders are set to return to bargaining table, hoping momentum generated can lead to labor deal.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. and the players union will return to the bargaining table on Tuesday in New York, hoping momentum generated over the weekend can lead to a labor deal.

headline.seo: N.H.L. and Players Union to Continue Talks Tuesday
headline.main: N.H.L. and Union to Continue Talks Tuesday
